nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_880_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He is a man who prefers action to words.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_881_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The child was told time and time again not to go near the railway but he didn't seem to listen.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_882_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: John studied hard before the examination and it paid off. He made an A.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_883_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In the meantime, focus your attention on something that you're really interested in and never quit.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_884_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: With reference to the school uniform policy, there were various thoughts and feelings among students.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_885_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Would you please look at my paper and give your suggestions about it?

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_886_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I felt obliged to go over there to say sorry to him as I didn't want to hurt his feelings.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_887_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It only took about 30 minutes before the high school was filled up with the survivors of the disaster.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_888_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He slipped and broke his leg. As a result, he will have to be away from school for two or three months.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_889_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: This newly invented device will help those people who tend to get themselves injured.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_890_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Whatever the problems in their personal lives, their thoughts can find paths that lead to inner satisfaction.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_891_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Sometimes I think how ready we are to take offense at each other by looking out only for our own interests, or envying someone else for their good things.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_892_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Don't feel frustrated easily and smile often as your participation and efforts will finally pay off.
